  extends AnnotatedTerm

AssociatedPort(NameAppl, NameAppl)

SelfPort
public case SelfPort(NameAppl port_name);
Self port. Port of the class itself.

Parameters:
port_name - the name of the port.

ExternalPort

public case ExternalPort(NameDecl port_name);
External port. Introduces a new (external) port that exports the bound ports to the environment.

Parameters:
port_name - the name of the port.

InternalPort

public case InternalPort(NameAppl proc_name,
                         NameAppl port_name);
Internal port. Identifies a port of an aggregated process.

Parameters:
proc_name - name of the aggregated process.
port_name - name of the process' port.

AssociatedPort

public case AssociatedPort(NameAppl class_name,
                           NameAppl port_name);
Associated port. Identifies a port of an associated process.

Parameters:
class_name - name of the associated class.
port_name - name of the process' port.
